page.title: 14ADULT EDUCATION CENTRE
page.content: URCHFONT MANOR IS WILTSHIRES ADULT EDUCATION COLLEDGE. IT IS RESIDENTIAL AND PROVIDES OPPORTUNITIES FOR ALL ADULTS TO LEARN AT LEISURE. THE OUT BUILDINGS HAVE BEEN CONVERTED INTO STUDIOS FOR USE BY CRAFT STUDENTS FOR DRAWING PAINTING AND WOOD CARVING. THERE ARE PLANS FOR FUTURE DEVELOPMENT THERE ARE SEVERAL COURSES RUNNING OVER TWO TO THREE YEARS GIVING OPPERTUNITIES FOR GROWTH AND DEVELOPMENT. THESE INCLUDE DRAWING, EMBROIDERY, PHOTOGRAPHY AND THEATRUCAL ARTS. THIS TYPE OF COURSE IS THE FIRST TO BE PIONEERED BY AN ADULT RESIDENTIAL COLLEGE. APPROXAMITLY 3500 STUDENTS ATTEND DURING AN AVERAGE YEAR. MANY ATTENDING WEEKEND COURSES COVERING SUBJECTS AS DIVERSE AS COMPUTER STUDIES, CHORAL MUSIC, VICTORIAN POETRY AND BOOK BINDING.
